name: Retail Dash
description:
Retail Dash is a Time management game where you get to run a market and feel the experience of serving customers and taking care of your store.

•You sell to customers

•You refund items for customers

•You restock the market

Also available on App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/retail-dash/id1645284575

CHECK OUR WEBSITE: https://thegategames.com/retail-dash
